title: Minimax estimation of discontinuous optimal transport maps: The semi-discrete case. (arXiv:2301.11302v2 [math.ST] UPDATED)
abstract: We consider the problem of estimating the optimal transport map between two probability distributions, $P$ and $Q$ in $\mathbb R^d$, on the basis of i.i.d. samples. All existing statistical analyses of this problem require the assumption that the transport map is Lipschitz, a strong requirement that, in particular, excludes any examples where the transport map is discontinuous. As a first step towards developing estimation procedures for discontinuous maps, we consider the important special case where the data distribution $Q$ is a discrete measure supported on a finite number of points in $\mathbb R^d$. We study a computationally efficient estimator initially proposed by Pooladian and Niles-Weed (2021), based on entropic optimal transport, and show in the semi-discrete setting that it converges at the minimax-optimal rate $n^{-1/2}$, independent of dimension. Other standard map estimation techniques both lack finite-sample guarantees in this setting and provably suffer from the curse

translated_title: 半离散情况下间断最优输运映射的极小极大估计
translated_abstract: 本文研究在独立同分布样本的基础上估计两个概率分布P和Q在$\mathbb{R}^d$上的最优输运映射的问题。现有的所有统计分析都要求输运映射是Lipschitz的，这是一个强的要求，特别是排除了输运映射是间断的情况。为了开发间断映射的估计程序，我们考虑了数据分布Q是支撑在$\mathbb{R}^d$上有限点集上的离散测度的重要特例。我们研究了一种计算上有效的估计器，该估计器最初由Pooladian和Niles-Weed(2021)提出，基于熵最优输运，并在半离散情况下证明，它以极小极大速率$n^{-1/2}$收敛，不依赖于维度。其他标准的映射估计技术在这种情况下缺乏有限样本保证，并且被证明受到诅咒的影响
tldr: 本文研究了间断最优输运映射的估计问题，在半离散的情况下，提出了一种计算上有效的估计器，以极小极大速率$n^{-1/2}$收敛，不依赖于维度，为解决间断映射的估计问题提供了新思路。
